workflow_metadata.name: BU-02 Integration Requirements Definition
workflow_metadata.description: Define high-level integration goal, target capabilities, required interactions, and success criteria

steps.name: Define Integration Goal
steps.description: Articulate what the integrated system should accomplish

steps.name: Identify Target Capabilities
steps.description: List all capabilities the integrated system must provide

steps.name: Map Components to Capabilities
steps.description: Determine which components provide which capabilities (from inventory)
outputs: Gap identification (capabilities not provided by any component)

steps.name: Define Required Interactions
steps.description: Specify which components must communicate with each other
outputs: Required interactions list with data flows and performance requirements

steps.name: Specify Non-Functional Requirements
steps.description: Define performance, reliability, security, scalability requirements

steps.name: Define Success Criteria
steps.description: Establish measurable criteria for successful integration
outputs: Success criteria list with measurement methods

checks: Integration goal is clear and specific
All target capabilities are mapped to components or identified as gaps
